title: What Is This Kylie Font Called?
content:

author: vanillabean

comments.content:
I would have thought that was hand drawn, unless the album it’s connected with uses the font elsewhere with different text. What album is it from?

JH

PS

my Friend is currently on tour with Kylie in the backing Band. He’s on trumpet in the brass section!

It’s from Body Language. ;-) And wow! That is awesome. I am a huge Kylie fan. \<33 Lucky him! =D

Here are some more pics of the font:

[http://www.virginmedia.com/images/kylie-gal-bodylanguage3.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012141348/http:/www.virginmedia.com/images/kylie-gal-bodylanguage3.jpg "http://www.virginmedia.com/images/kylie-gal-bodylanguage3.jpg")  
 [http://i10.ebayimg.com/04/i/000/cb/e2/628e\_1.JPG](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012141348/http:/i10.ebayimg.com/04/i/000/cb/e2/628e_1.JPG "http://i10.ebayimg.com/04/i/000/cb/e2/628e\_1.JPG")

That looks very much drawn from scratch.

\*off topic\*

I saw Kylie live last tuesday here in istanbul. the crowd was rude (as always here) and not very much responsive. the concert place was crappy, very small, she had to do the “small” show and skip some pretty good songs. too bad... but at least i saw the show.

say hi to you friend...

\*/off topic\*

dr

Well from those pics it def seems ’hand drawn’ as opposed to a font, sorry.

I’ll ask my mate about the Instanbul gig when he finishes the tour. I’m sure he’ll have plenty of ’stories’ to tell me when he gets back. Here’s his myspace page;

[http://www.myspace.com/graemeflowers](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012141348/http:/www.myspace.com/graemeflowers "http://www.myspace.com/graemeflowers")

JH

Damn I’m jealous!
